review: Use this for the TV in kids room.  They love it!
author: Bliss C. Varughese

review: Not what I expected you have to pay for everything
author: Eric Carson

review: It's Great! Easy to set up! Easy to use! Affordable!
author: Angela

review: Excellent product. Greatly expands your viewer options, is easy to install, has a very simple remote and is inexpensive. I am sorry that I waited so long to make this purchase.  Whether it's movies, kids programming, television shows or original programming-this is the way to go. I'd give it 6 stars, if that were possible.
author: Richard E. Berman

review: I am surprised how well this works.  I use it on my TV that is in my home gym, and the router is on the other side of the house.
author: jeffrey holloway

review: Awesome! I received this as a Christmas gift and I have been enjoying it with my tv.
author: Mary M. Ovalle

review: Easy to install and activate; easy to use; minimal physical profile (it's SMALL).  Really like access to Amazon Cloud Storage, as -- with Amazon Prime -- I can store photos for free AND VIEW THEM ON THE TV.
author: M. Boyd
